update.outdated: Using outdated version on one or more modules
upgrade.mekanism.energy.desc: Increases energy efficiency and capacity of machinery.
upgrade.mekanism.filter.desc: A filter that separates heavy water from regular water.
upgrade.mekanism.gas.desc: Increases the efficiency of gas-using machinery.
gui.mekanism.visuals.toobig: Radius too big to display visuals
gui.mekanism.sizeModeConflict: has no effect currently, because single item mode is turned on.
gui.mekanism.filterSelect.title: Create New Filter
Ejects items automatically to connected inventories.
gui.mekanism.logisticalSorter.roundRobin: Cycles between all connected inventories when sending items.
gui.mekanism.logisticalSorter.singleItem: Sends a single item instead of a whole stack each time (overrides min and max set in ItemStack filters).
gui.mekanism.teleporter.noAccess: You don't have access to this Teleporter.
gui.mekanism.entangloporter.noAccess: You don't have access to this Entangloporter.
tooltip.mekanism.configurator.induction_: Toggled Induction Port transfer mode to
tooltip.mekanism.configurator.reactor_po: Toggled Reactor Port eject mode to
tooltip.mekanism.restrictive_description: Only used if no other paths available
tooltip.mekanism.seismicReader.needsEner: Not enough energy to interpret vibration
tooltip.mekanism.mekanism.SeismicReader: A portable machine that uses seismic vibrations to provide information on differing layers of the world.
tooltip.mekanism.Bin: A block used to store large quantities of a single type of item.
tooltip.mekanism.teleporter_frame: The frame used to construct the Teleporter multiblock, allowing a portal to be generated within the structure.
tooltip.mekanism.steel_casing: A sturdy, steel-based casing used as a foundation for machinery.
tooltip.mekanism.dynamic_tank: The casing used in the Dynamic Tank multiblock, a structure capable of storing great amounts of fluid.
tooltip.mekanism.structural_glass: An advanced, reinforced material of glass that drops when broken and can be used in the structure of any applicable multiblock.
tooltip.mekanism.dynamic_valve: A valve that can be placed on a Dynamic Tank multiblock, allowing for fluids to be inserted and extracted via external piping.
tooltip.mekanism.thermal_evaporation_con: The controller for a Thermal Evaporation Plant, acting as the master block of the structure. Only one of these should be placed on a multiblock.
tooltip.mekanism.thermal_evaporation_val: A valve that can be placed on a Thermal Evaporation Plant multiblock, allowing for fluids to be inserted and extracted via external piping.
tooltip.mekanism.thermal_evaporation_blo: A copper-alloyed casing used in the structure of a Thermal Evaporation Plant, using its advanced material to conduct the great amounts of heat necessary for processing.
tooltip.mekanism.induction_casing: A type of energy-resistant casing used in the creation of an Energized Induction Matrix multiblock.
tooltip.mekanism.induction_port: A port that can be placed on an Energized Induction Matrix multiblock, allowing for energy to be inserted from and output to external cabling.
tooltip.mekanism.InductionCell: A highly conductive energy capacitor capable of storing massive amounts of energy in a single block. Housed in an Energized Induction Matrix to expand the multiblock's energy storage.
tooltip.mekanism.InductionProvider: An advanced complex of coolant systems, conductors and transformers capable of expanding the Energized Induction Matrix's maximum rate of energy transfer.
tooltip.mekanism.superheating_element: A modular, somewhat dangerous radiator that is capable of emitting massive amounts of heat to its surroundings.
tooltip.mekanism.pressure_disperser: A block used disperse steam throughout a multiblock structure. These should form a gapless, horizontal plane in order to properly control steam flow.
tooltip.mekanism.boiler_casing: A pressure-resistant, dense casing used in the creation of a Thermoelectric Boiler multiblock.
tooltip.mekanism.boiler_valve: A valve that can be placed on a Thermoelectric Boiler multiblock, allowing for the insertion of energy and water along with the extraction of produced steam.
tooltip.mekanism.security_desk: A central control hub for managing the security of all your owned machinery.
tooltip.mekanism.EnrichmentChamber: A simple machine used to enrich ores into two of their dust counterparts, as well as perform many other operations.
tooltip.mekanism.OsmiumCompressor: A fairly advanced machine used to compress osmium into various dusts in order to create their ingot counterparts.
tooltip.mekanism.Combiner: A machine used to combine dusts and cobblestone to form their ore counterparts.
tooltip.mekanism.Crusher: A machine used to crush ingots into their dust counterparts, as well as perform many other operations.
tooltip.mekanism.DigitalMiner: A highly-advanced, filter-based, auto-miner that can mine whatever block you tell it to within a 32 block (max) radius.
tooltip.mekanism.MetallurgicInfuser: A machine used to infuse various materials into (generally) metals to create metal alloys and other compounds.
tooltip.mekanism.PurificationChamber: An advanced machine capable of processing ores into three clumps, serving as the initial stage of 300% ore processing.
tooltip.mekanism.EnergizedSmelter: A simple machine that serves as a Mekanism-based furnace that runs off of energy.
tooltip.mekanism.Teleporter: A machine capable of teleporting players to various locations defined by another teleporter.
tooltip.mekanism.ElectricPump: An advanced, upgradeable pump, capable of extracting any type of fluid.
tooltip.mekanism.PersonalChest: A 54-slot chest that can be opened anywhere- even from your own inventory.
tooltip.mekanism.Chargepad: A universal chargepad that can charge any energized item from any mod.
tooltip.mekanism.LogisticalSorter: A filter-based, advanced sorting machine that can auto-eject specified items out of and into adjacent inventories and Logistical Transporters.
tooltip.mekanism.RotaryCondensentrator: A machine capable of converting gasses into their fluid form and vice versa.
tooltip.mekanism.ChemicalInjectionChambe: An elite machine capable of processing ores into four shards, serving as the initial stage of 400% ore processing.
tooltip.mekanism.ElectrolyticSeparator: A machine that uses the process of electrolysis to split apart a certain gas into two different gasses.
tooltip.mekanism.PrecisionSawmill: A machine used to process logs and other wood-based items more efficiently, as well as to obtain sawdust.
tooltip.mekanism.ChemicalDissolutionCham: An ultimate machine used to chemically dissolve all impurities of an ore, leaving an unprocessed slurry behind.
tooltip.mekanism.ChemicalWasher: An ultimate machine that cleans unprocessed slurry and prepares it for crystallization.
tooltip.mekanism.ChemicalCrystallizer: An ultimate machine used to crystallize purified ore slurry into ore crystals.
tooltip.mekanism.ChemicalOxidizer: A machine capable of oxidizing solid materials into gas phase.
tooltip.mekanism.ChemicalInfuser: A machine that produces a new gas by infusing two others.
tooltip.mekanism.SeismicVibrator: A machine that uses seismic vibrations to provide information on differing layers of the world.
tooltip.mekanism.PressurizedReactionCham: An advanced machine that processes a solid, liquid and gaseous mixture and creates both a gaseous and solid product.
tooltip.mekanism.FluidTank: A handy, sturdy, portable tank that lets you carry multiple buckets of fluid wherever you please. Also doubles as a bucket!
tooltip.mekanism.FluidicPlenisher: A machine that is capable of creating entire lakes by filling ravines with fluids.
tooltip.mekanism.Laser: An advanced form of linear energy transfer that utilizes an extremely collimated beam of light.
tooltip.mekanism.LaserAmplifier: A block that can be used to merge, redirect and amplify laser beams, with fine controls over when to fire.
tooltip.mekanism.LaserTractorBeam: A block used to merge and redirect laser beams. Collects drops from blocks it has broken.
tooltip.mekanism.SolarNeutronActivator: A machine that directs the neutron radiation of the sun into its internal reservoir, allowing for the slow creation of various isotopes.
tooltip.mekanism.Oredictionificator: A machine used to unify and translate between various items and blocks using the Ore Dictionary.
tooltip.mekanism.Factory: A machine that serves as an upgrade to regular machinery, allowing for multiple processing operations to occur at once.
tooltip.mekanism.ResistiveHeater: A condensed, coiled resistor capable of converting electrical energy directly into heat energy.
tooltip.mekanism.FormulaicAssemblicator: A machine that uses energy to rapidly craft items and blocks from Crafting Formulas. Doubles as an advanced crafting bench.
tooltip.mekanism.FuelwoodHeater: A machine that is capable of producing large quantities of heat energy by burning combustible items.
tooltip.mekanism.QuantumEntangloporter: A highly-advanced block capable of transmitting any practical resource across long distances and dimensions.
tooltip.mekanism.osmium_ore: A strong mineral that can be found at nearly any height in the world. It is known to have many uses in the construction of machinery.
tooltip.mekanism.copper_ore: A common, conductive material that can be used in the production of wires. Its ability to withstand high heats also makes it essential to advanced machinery.
tooltip.mekanism.tin_ore: A lightweight, yet sturdy, conductive material that is found slightly less commonly than Copper.
tooltip.mekanism.control.pulse.desc: Only active upon first receiving signal
reactor.disabled.desc: Will not emit a redstone signal
reactor.ready.desc: Reactor has reached the required heat level to ignite
reactor.capacity.desc: The reactor's core heat capacity has been met
reactor.depleted.desc: The reactor has insufficient fuel to sustain a reaction
cmd.mek.testrules.usage: Setup world rules for testing (no mob spawning, daylight cycle or weather)
cmd.mek.testrules: Mob spawning, daylight cycle and weather disabled!
cmd.mek.tp.usage: Teleport to new coordinates, saving last position on a stack
cmd.mek.tp: Teleported to %d,%d,%d - saved last position on stack
cmd.mek.tp.missing.args: Teleporting requires three coordinates: x, y, z
cmd.mek.tpop.usage: Return to last position on stack
cmd.mek.chunk.watch.usage: Add caller's chunk to watch list for loading/unloading events
cmd.mek.chunk.unwatch.usage: Remove caller's chunk from watch list for chunk loading/unloading events
cmd.mek.chunk.clear.usage: Remove all chunks from watch list for chunk loading/unloading events
